item.title: Winning the FCS Cybersecurity Competition: Lessons Learned
item.description: [üèÜ] The Victory ~/blog/fcs-competition After placing 2nd in 2024, our CyberForce team came back with a vengeance this year. Taking first place at the 3rd Annual FCS Cybersecurity Competition was an incredible experience that taught us valuable lessons about preparation, teamwork, and performing under pressure. [üìã] What Made the Difference ~/blog/fcs-competition/strategy Several key factors contributed to our success this year: Role specialization: Each team member focused on specific domains - network security, forensics, web exploitation, and cryptography Practice infrastructure: We built a lab environment that mirrored competition scenarios Communication: Real-time coordination using shared documents and voice chat Time management: Prioritizing high-value challenges and knowing when to move on [üí°] Key Takeaways ~/blog/fcs-competition/lessons Technical Skills OSINT Forensics Web Exploitation Cryptanalysis Soft Skills Team Coordination Stress Management Time Boxing scoreboard.
